body:
Lately, the Avicus Network has been having issues, the reason players cannot join is due to the HUbs being down, which makes /where, /msg, /server, and /list broken.

So, I figured out that it is possible to still play.

Just use the direct connect IP such as - mczone01.avic.us or nexus04.avic.us

You put the [Server Name].avic.us

Hope this helps!

Minecraft Status - http://xpaw.ru/mcstatus/

replies.body:
This is weird.
When I try to connect using mczone03.avic.us, I get an error message.
But when I login to the website avicus.net and then try to connect, it works.
Is this related or connected in any way?
